Row.Text: Receive [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to 15% of your [ICON_FAITH] Faith generation in cities with a National Park. +200% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism to all National Parks. Charming or Breathtaking tiles adjacent to Mountains, Woods, or Natural Wonders receive +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith. Gain the Miko of Ameth unique unit with Divine Right.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Guildhouse bonus: Farms in this city provide +1 [ICON_Production] Production to adjacent Farms.

Kokkoro's unique civilian unit that replaces the Naturalist. Cheaper to purchase than the Naturalist it replaces. Can create a single National Park to attract [ICON_Tourism] tourists. Can plant Woods (second-growth) with Conservation. Must be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith.

Kokkoro's unique civilian unit that replaces the Naturalist. Cheaper to purchase than the Naturalist it replaces. Can create a single National Park to attract [ICON_Tourism] tourists. Can plant Woods (second-growth) without prerequisite civics. Must be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith.

Ameth has sent you a new oracle, little guide Kokkoro. Magnificent nature is your source of power, and you will protect your people and allies steadily with its help. If you can have strong conviction, your calls will be answered by your patron deity. Go forth with blessings of wind spirits, and surely you will be successful in every endeavour.
